name: difss2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl6ss(c0, c1, cdif(c1, c2), wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)))
-| wss(cdif(c1, c2), c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)))
-| wss(cdif(c1, c2), c1)

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
-| wss(cdif(c1, c2), c1)

comment: If a class is contained in a difference, it is contained in the minuend. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
